definitions.definition: Bars or ribs , usually of stone or wood , or other material, that subdivide an opening or stand in relief against a door or wall as an ornamental feature .
A delicate interlacing of lines reminiscent of the architectural ornament.

main_definition: ( architecture ) Bars or ribs , usually of stone or wood , or other material, that subdivide an opening or stand in relief against a door or wall as an ornamental feature .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A delicate interlacing of lines reminiscent of the architectural ornament.
